message.content:
cs.CG, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with numerical schemes for solving heat diffusion on surface meshes, which is a topic related to computational geometry (cs.CG) and computer vision (cs.CV). The application of the proposed method to brain imaging and graph pattern analysis suggests that it also falls under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and scientific computing (cs.NA). Finally, the use of spectral decomposition and orthogonal polynomials in the proposed method indicates that it may also be relevant to signal processing (cs.SI).
